name: count_column_values
description: Counts the occurrences of each unique value in a specified column of an Excel or CSV file.

file_path.description: The full path of the Excel (.xlsx, .xls) or CSV (.csv) file to be analyzed.

sheet_name.description: The sheet name or index in the Excel file (ignored for CSV files).

column_name.description: The column name whose values will be counted.
